content.transcript_1: Any person could include a variety of third parties and intermediaries acting on an individual or entity's behalf.
content.transcript_2: Knowing does not require actual awareness, but rather includes deliberate ignorance or willful blindness.
content.transcript_3: Be alert to these indicators of potential wrongdoing by third parties.
